title.rendered: Selling your Amazon Business the seller’s experience with Ben Leonard of Ecombrokers.com

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:26 — 23.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 25:26 — 23.3MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

If you’re even considering selling your Amazon business, then it may be that you’re ready to sell!

Ben Leonard didn’t start thinking about it until it was time! That said that’s not the same as when you’re building a business TO sell. But if you’re running your business you’re feeling it’s time to sell, it’s time to prepare.

You’ll Learn:

  • When to know that you are ready to sell
  • Understanding that it is never too early to prepare to sell
  • Why it’s better to work with a broker than go direct
  • How to get to where you want in your business
